update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`. Not applicable in mode 1.

*See also: [JSN-SR04T Waterproof Ultrasonic Range Finder](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/jsn_sr04t.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the [UART bus](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart) you wish to use for this sensor. Use this if you want to use multiple UART buses at once.

*See also: [JSN-SR04T Waterproof Ultrasonic Range Finder](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/jsn_sr04t.html#configuration-variables)*

model.docs:
Sensor model. Available options: `jsn_sr04t` (default) and `aj_sr04m`.

*See also: [JSN-SR04T Waterproof Ultrasonic Range Finder](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/jsn_sr04t.html#configuration-variables)*
